org.jetel.component

Interface TransformDescriptor<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphParameterValueFunctionDescriptor, PartitionFunctionDescriptor, RecordDenormalizeDescriptor, RecordGenerateDescriptor, RecordNormalizeDescriptor, RecordRollupDescriptor, RecordTransformDescriptor

    public interface TransformDescriptor<T>
    This class aggregates all necessary information for a transformation interface (transformation code loaded by various components RecordTransform, RecordRollup, JavaRunnable, ...) to be instantiated by TransformFactory. Supported languages are java, CTL1 and CTL2.
    See Also:
    TransformFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createCTL1Transform(java.lang.String transformCode, org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
      Creates instance of getTransformClass() class based on the CTL1 transformation code.
      T createInterpretedCTL2Transform(TransformLangExecutor executor, org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
      Creates instance of transformation interface based on CTL2 interpreted executor.

      java.lang.Class<T> getTransformClass() 

    • Method Detail

      • getTransformClass

        java.lang.Class<T> getTransformClass()
        Returns:
        the class of interface which is instantiated by TransformFactory, usually it is a descendant of Transform interface

      • createCTL1Transform

        T createCTL1Transform(java.lang.String transformCode,
                    org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
        Creates instance of getTransformClass() class based on the CTL1 transformation code.
        Parameters:
        transformCode - CTL1 transformation code to be converted to dedicated class
        logger - a logger necessary for CTL1 compiler
        Returns:
        instance of transformation interface defined by CTL1 transformation code

      • getCompiledCTL2TransformClass

        java.lang.Class<? extends CTLAbstractTransform> getCompiledCTL2TransformClass()
        Returns:
        class which is used for compiled mode of CTL2 compiler to be overridden by generated java code

      • createInterpretedCTL2Transform

        T createInterpretedCTL2Transform(TransformLangExecutor executor,
                               org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
        Creates instance of transformation interface based on CTL2 interpreted executor.
        Parameters:
        executor - CTL2 executor of transformation code
        logger -
        Returns:
        instance of transformation interface based on CTL2 interpreted executor
